ref_criterion: Recognizes the healthcare context regarding monitoring for the possibility of recurrence, with recommended follow-up based on breast cancer type, treatment, stage, and preference.
gen_criterion: Provides a standard follow-up schedule for breast cancer patients, including imaging and physical exams, after chemotherapy completion.

ref_criterion: Recommends timely mammograms every 3-6 months during the first 3 years, every 6-12 months in years 4 to 5, and annually thereafter.
gen_criterion: Provides a standard follow-up schedule for breast cancer patients, including imaging and physical exams, after chemotherapy completion.

ref_criterion: Proposes bone scans, CT, and MRI with changing or recurring symptoms as per review, but not as routine scans.
gen_criterion: States that patients should receive regular check-ups and imaging tests as recommended by their healthcare provider, rather than providing a specific schedule.

ref_criterion: Fails to advise on follow-up by oncologists, especially for patients taking aromatase inhibitors who may need bone scans.
gen_criterion: Fails to acknowledge the importance of regular follow-up appointments for breast cancer patients, potentially leading to delayed diagnosis and treatment.

ref_criterion: Asks whether the patient has any concerns about new symptoms or physical exam findings, as they would change the management and follow-up routine.
gen_criterion: Advises patients to seek medical attention if they experience any unusual symptoms or concerns, rather than providing a standard schedule.

ref_criterion: Asks if the user is on any breast-conserving therapy.
gen_criterion: Provides clear and concise information about follow-up care for breast cancer patients, using natural language and avoiding technical jargon.

ref_criterion: Asks if the user has had a mastectomy of the affected breast versus a bilateral mastectomy; if only the affected side of the breast is removed, then a mammogram will be needed for the contralateral side.
gen_criterion: Provides a standard follow-up schedule for breast cancer patients, including imaging and physical exams, after chemotherapy completion.

ref_criterion: Recommends regular gynecologic follow-up for all women, especially if the user is on Tamoxifen therapy.
gen_criterion: Provides a standard follow-up schedule for breast cancer patients, including imaging and physical exams, after chemotherapy completion.

ref_criterion: Fails to provide a recommendation against routine CBC and tumor marker testing.
gen_criterion: Incorrectly states that breast cancer patients do not need regular follow-up appointments, potentially leading to delayed diagnosis and treatment.
